website_summaries.verdict: An affordable alternative to the LEM with astounding capacity and quality. The best value.
pros: Blades are made of durable steel
cons: Motor requires a cooling period between sessions

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother.
customer_reviews.text: Absolute garbage. None of the blades with it worked. When we used the blade from our old grinder, we were able to get it to do a little grinding at a time. Had to stop for frequent cleanouts. Had some little success with grinding through large plate first, then through the medium plate (the size we wanted). This was chicken, without the bones. I’d hate to think what it would have done with beef or venison. Will never buy another from this manufacturer. My old grinder, from Northern Industrial, lasted for 8 years. This didn’t work well even a single use. Now we get the hassle of cleaning it up, repacking and returning it.
customer_reviews.author: TaraBenet

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for deer, elk, whatever!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing grinder! I was unsure, at the pricepoint, this would handle our wild game workload. We purchased this grinder early October 2016. Since then we processed 2 bull elk, 4 deer and some store meat. Single grind, double grind, coarse, fine, made sausage and not a single problem. Temperatures varied from 60s to 20s, F, during use. Ran it for 4-6 hours consecutively for 3 days straight. No issues. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Airbornetowgunner

customer_reviews.title: A meat eating machine!
customer_reviews.text: This grinder has plenty of power for grinding any meat you wish to grind. The tray and auger are cast aluminum, not dishwasher safe, but I prefer to hand wash everything that comes into contact with raw meat. If you choose to stuff sausage, USE THE FOOT PEDAL, otherwise expect to have pate’. I didn’t rate the durability because a few dozen pounds is hardly a durability test. That will take time. Compared to brands that friends of mine own, it’s no louder and just as powerful as grinders for two times the price. Take care of it, like any tool, and it should take care of your needs.
customer_reviews.author: William Peebles

customer_reviews.title: Untruth in advertising!
customer_reviews.text: The company said "reconditioned" but they had obviously not reconditioned it. This is a great machine, my son has had the exact same one for two years and it has worked great. Ad said that this was factory reconditioned. Motor was bad and obviously had been. Love the machine in general. Somebody has to look up the definition of "factory reconditioned."
customer_reviews.author: clay

customer_reviews.title: This is the Meat Grinder You Want to Buy
customer_reviews.text: I am hard to please, read mountains of reviews, considered price & decided upon this model. Extremely happy with the purchase. Grinds pork & deer meat faster than I can feed the hopper. Very Very Good using the sausage maker. Learning curve is small, works very well & I use natural casings. Extremely happy with the purchase. 1 bit of advice - do not even consider cheaply made products as they will frustrate you with increased level of difficulty & uneven results.
customer_reviews.author: J. French Rennier

customer_reviews.title: Misleading Description. No sausage stuffer. Light weight home grade unit.
customer_reviews.text: My kit did not contain the sausage stuffing tubes and attachment. There was not a place in the box for them and the box was sealed so I suspect the description is no longer accurate. Hopper, grinding blades, plates, tube and worm all appear to be excellent quality. Motor unit is looking get weight. Silver plated plastic trim on motor unit. No way this light weight unit pulls 3000 Watts as advertised. It ran well course grinding a deer, but it is not commercial grade, heavy duty, or 3000 watts. Price would be fair if it included the sausage stuffer parts as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Parts rusted!!
customer_reviews.text: I regard putting them in the dishwasher. They're made of Polished Cast Aluminum and it was simply washed away. Oh, and I only used the machine once, so I can't say if it's good.
customer_reviews.author: Ehab Aref

customer_reviews.title: Powerful meat grinder
customer_reviews.text: Durable components and helpful instructions which should be followed for wonderful grinding of meat quickly without problem. I have used it to grind venison as well as pork and beef. I found it helpful to use the wagon wheel grind followed be the coarse grind. Cutting the meat in 1" strips, placing on a cookie tray in freezer for 5 min. allows great grinding. Washing all parts in hot water, drying well with paper towels, and spray coating steels parts with a cooking oil spray ensures continued success.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A game processors best friend!
customer_reviews.text: If you're wanting a grinder that can process your hunt meat quickly and easily this is your guy.. this grinder chewed through 1 elk and 3 antelope in what I would only describe as record speed! it out worked brand name grinders that I had borrowed from friends that were twice as expensive.. If I could do a 10 * I would absolutely do it.. If you're looking to do a 100Lb or more of meat a year this is the only grinder I would consider..
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Cook

customer_reviews.title: Ran 40+ pounds of meat through this bad boy. Grinds and stuffs great
customer_reviews.text: Ran 40+ pounds of meat through this bad boy. Grinds and stuffs great. Some of the reviews get a little carried away when they say you can't slow it down, or it pulls the meat in without aid of a push stick. The reason I deducted a star was for the chicken s*** light duty plastic push stick and sausage stuffing tubes. I've seen heavier duty attachments on $90 machines. Disappointed that they did so well with the machine and cheaper out on the accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Big

customer_reviews.title: Using for Home-cooked Dog Food
customer_reviews.text: I make home cooked dog food(no bones), usually 30-35 lb batches. This grinder easily and efficiently handled grinding up cooked meats and veggies. Makes processing the home cooked dog food So Much Easier and much less time consuming. Definitely recommend this grinder.
customer_reviews.author: NOLAClaire

customer_reviews.title: Great grinder!  Good for a first-time user like me! Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: 1st time meat grinder user here. This was very easy to figure out how to use. It was also fairly easy to clean. I use this for making my dog's food. It does grind small bones, although as the directions state, it is best to grind them partially frozen. It works better that way. I have no complaints. It is of good quality and Amazon offers an extended warranty which I purchased just in case. I would recommend this grinder. I really like it!
customer_reviews.author: SSTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: does a good grind
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it 6 times so far, but so far, it does a really good grind, is fast and easy. i like the hopper size and feed tube size. and the consistency of the grind is store quality imo. i couldnt get that before with other grinders. it didnt jam or have any issues at all, though i did just use meats, chicken, beef and pork. easy to work with, easy to clean, nice short worm gear and fairly large throat for feeding and good tray size.
customer_reviews.author: patrick hubert

customer_reviews.title: Not only does it work great, it is super fast
customer_reviews.text: So I have only used it once now, but this is a must have for any outdoorsman. It chews up frozen deer into burger with no issues. When if you have some sinew still on the meat. Not only does it work great, it is super fast, easy to clean and awesome power. The only way to get a better machine is to spend 600 to 1200 on a big commercial model.. can't say enough about this mega force 3000
customer_reviews.author: William Pennell

customer_reviews.title: It worked great
customer_reviews.text: It was great except for the meat pushed the top kepped coming off. The more you would stuff the harder it became to hold onto.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this machine last year for the purpose of making Italian Sausages . Today a couple of friends and I got together and made 30 pounds of sausage and stuffed them in natural casings. This machine is fantastic and made the job so easy and fun! The cleanup is a breeze. Very high quality and an excellent performer and product all the way around. I am the daughter of a professional meat cutter of 52 years in our family's grocery market and have been involved with making hundreds of pounds of sausage using commercial equipment...this meat grinder/stuffer for home use is perfect-highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: cindy maragos

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy product
customer_reviews.text: This is great for the two deer a year processor
customer_reviews.author: Anne Tucker

customer_reviews.title: It grinds up the elk hamburger great.
customer_reviews.text: Even the half frozen sinewy meat that we use in the dog stew with the wagon wheel blade.Beats chopping it up or pressure cooking it to beak it down before adding to the stew. Even threw a piece of heart through it and it didn't slow down. Cut my dog stew prep time way down. Even with the cleanup time for the grinder. Coarse blade works great for chili meat and other dishes like spaghetti. Did double grind starting with coarse grinder then fine grinder blade for burgers. Even tried some Montreal Steak seasoning sprinkled on some of the meat before grinding. Wife was very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Aroyjetson

customer_reviews.title: Loved it, did a great job every single time
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product not even 2 years ago and used it maybe twice a month, sometimes more, sometimes less. Made sausages mainly, the machine worked absolutely in my favor, Loved it, did a great job every single time. I could not have been more satisfied up until today. Tried to grind some meat and the engine just quit on me for not apparent reason. Pretty frustrating since I got used to the machine and accustomed to making my own brats. Very unhappy, the machine is not really cheap and supposed to last. This actually sucks pretty bad :-( Please read follow up. I am a happy camper again
customer_reviews.author: Mathias Krebs

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend this machine
customer_reviews.text: The machine gets stuck all the time. I reversed and it ran another minute or less and stuck again. Now the blade does not spin at all without any meat in it. This is just the third time I used the machine. Each time I ground about 5 lbs of chicken. I do not recommend this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Lai Q Pham

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this unit for grinding my ribye and top sirloin steaks into lean ground burgers. Best tasting burgers ever. The unit was easy to assemble and disassemble for cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: jbbigguns

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy!
customer_reviews.text: Used for the first time 8-8-18. Runs about 3 seconds and shuts off. Will try to return although return policy is probably expired. I bought this model due bad reviews on the others. Get a good one.
customer_reviews.author: Butch

customer_reviews.title: Ground up 38 pounds of meat first use! "Not Bones"
customer_reviews.text: I just ground up 14 pounds of pork shoulder and 20 pounds of venison and not a single issue. I can't really understand the people on here saying it would not grind meat up? I'm pretty sure they didn't read the directions.
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Meat Grinder
customer_reviews.text: My husband absolutely loved this grinder. A friend gave us a tip for easier clean up. We wiped every piece/part that we were using down with mineral oil before starting. Nothing got dried on and the clean up was a breeze!!
customer_reviews.author: Squeeze

customer_reviews.title: Can't judge a book by the cover
customer_reviews.text: Upon opening the box I was disappointed by the lightness and seemingly cheap looking components enough to request a return. But I needed a grinder so I tried it out ... wow, this grinder works and the components cleaned up easily. The only reason it gets a 4 is because it would be a 5+ if it was dishwasher safe.
customer_reviews.author: Buzz

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this grinder.
customer_reviews.text: Got it at 7pm tonight, and was done grinding the whole deer and cleaned up by 8:30pm, Super easy to assemble, grinds great. It will grind faster than I could put it in. FYI its hand wash only, but that's ok because its easy to take apart and clean. Ground 30 pounds of venison in less than 20 minutes, It never clogged up or choked. Very pleased!!!
customer_reviews.author: C. Becker

customer_reviews.title: Great grinder.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely impressed with the grinder. I was worried after reading reviews about it might be difficult to grind meat, that it might turn to mush. Not so. Ground 10lbs of beef that had been frozen. Just let it thaw a while in the fridge until switching to a cooler to speed that up. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: werned

customer_reviews.title: Everything we wanted and more.
customer_reviews.text: Wow, really surprised how well this works. Surprising because it's relatively light weight but don't be fooled. The cast aluminum is in all the right places. We almost bought a slightly less expensive version of this brand but saw that this one had a cooling fan in the motor for only $20 more. Were hoping it will lengthen the life. (Hot motor might wear more, but just my theory) Makes a great grind of our deer which is all we really wanted. Looking forward to trying our hand at sausage stuffing too.
customer_reviews.author: Auntie D

customer_reviews.title: This machine does a very good job and if meat is chilled before grinding it ...
customer_reviews.text: This machine does a very good job and if meat is chilled before grinding it goes very quick. I ran about a 15 lbs of shoulder pork in about 15 minutes. Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Powerdog

customer_reviews.title: So fast and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. I used to grind with a stand mixer attachment and it took forever. I can grind and stuff in about a tenth of the time with this machine. It's motor holds up. I love it love it love it.
customer_reviews.author: aukalou

customer_reviews.title: Look no further - this is the one for you home cooks.
customer_reviews.text: This machine is great! PLUS to customer service at Mercantile Station 2 is beyond 5 stars. If you are looking for a home meat grinder that does just about everything you can think of: dog food (frozen chicken legs/gizzards/etc), Sausages (14 lbs pork shoulder/seasonings) this is just what you need. I have completed both of the above and do not have a single complaint. Next on the list is fresh ground beef and lamb, just waiting for some room in the fridge/freezer. Honestly this is one of the best purchases I have made and will get full use for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: danoaz

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to assemble,  but great product!
customer_reviews.text: The instructions weren't very good. We watch a YouTube video several times to figure it out. Once that was done it was smooth sailing. The product works great. We made our own sausage. Just make the instructions a lot better!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Catalano

customer_reviews.title: WOW
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic meat grinder. This year, I ground up two deer with no problems. The MegaForce 3000 powered through it with no issues. A couple things: DO ensure the meat is ALMOST frozen before grinding and, most importantly, ensure the flat end of the little "star shaped blade" is facing back into the meat grinder. I had BIG problems before reading that hint in another review. Someone who works for the company had posted that hint and it IMMEDIATELY made the difference in this grinder's performance.
customer_reviews.author: John R. Fox

customer_reviews.title: Best meat grinder I've ever used. Great for deer!
customer_reviews.text: I like this grinder so much that I buy them as gifts for other hunters. I can grind 25 lbs of deer meat in 6 minutes (on low power). This thing is a beast. Have processed 6 or 7 deer with this grinder and it hasn't clogged or jammed once. If you put meat in it, it will grind it.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Hollenbeck

customer_reviews.title: Good overall value.
customer_reviews.text: First grind was about 60 pounds of pork butt and chuck for sausage. It got pretty warm and slow on the beef (on the biggest grinding plate) even with partially frozen beef. The pedal is nice to have.
customer_reviews.author: JamesV

customer_reviews.title: Great Grinder and Stuffer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great grinder and stuffer instructions could be a little bit more informative but the overall performance of this unit is great doesn't slow down or bog down, i use it to grind pork (partially frozen) for sausage stuffing Had one minor issue with the top tray becoming discolored after hand washing - sent an e-mail to customer service on a SUNDAY and they responded back within an hour - FANTASTIC! they apologized and sent me a replacement free of charge that i received before weeks end - Great Customer service! I highly recommend this unit, you won't be sorry!
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: it performed great grinding 10 lbs of very chilled (partially frozen) boneless ...
customer_reviews.text: I have only used it once so far, but, it performed great grinding 10 lbs of very chilled (partially frozen) boneless pork butts for a small batch of sausage. I was surprised how light the grinder was and it had no problem grinding as fast as I could load the pork strips into the machine. I also used the stuffer attachment with the slower speed and it also worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Ray C

customer_reviews.title: Even the dogs love it!
customer_reviews.text: The Grinder performs as advertised. I have been using it to grind chicken wings for my dogs and it has performed perfectly. All of the parts are well-made, strong motor, and large enough to handle what I have stuffed in it. :) For the price you cannot go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Scott_H

customer_reviews.title: Constantly Clogs
customer_reviews.text: Can't handle thigh meat with skin; I spent more time using the reverse function and taking it apart to clear clogs than anyone should ever have to! I even freezer chilled it to get it ready. Sadly, not impressed and I am returning it and going back a poof processor instead.
customer_reviews.author: Corie Bertrand

customer_reviews.title: Excelente Calidad
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, I bought it in November 2018 and took it to Venezuela. I am grinding an average of 50 Kg per month and the machine is like new, excellent cooling and without any problem, all its pieces of excellent quality and the blades like new. I am really very happy with this purchase and I dare to recommend this product widely in the security that they will enjoy a great team
customer_reviews.author: Luis R.

customer_reviews.title: Can't Beat This Bad Boy For The Money - It Can Get It Done
customer_reviews.text: I ground 40 lbs of deer meat in less than 12 minutes. It never even slowed down and I never had to use the reverse on a clog up. Clean up was as easy as described and only took a few minutes. It worked circles around my last much more expensive machine. Any machine that go through 40 lbs of deer meat that fast is tops in by book. I could have used an extra pair of hands as I couldn't keep up with it.
customer_reviews.author: Willian J. Danner

customer_reviews.title: 3h straight
customer_reviews.text: Used it for 3h straight making beef and pork sausages and it did it like a champ. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Sotirov

customer_reviews.title: STX Megaforce 3000 Series Meat Grinder
customer_reviews.text: After hearing about what grocery store hamburger has added to it, we decided to make our own ground beef. I looked at many different models of grinders,on many different web sites. We decided on the Megaforce because of the 3000 watts and the air cooling. We tried chuck steak first for grinding and the machine did a awesome job. We froze the meat (took the meat out about 30 minutes before using it) and cut it in strips. Process was a breeze, along with clean-up. The unit is not very loud. The price is good for what we wanted.
customer_reviews.author: P. Strub

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this machine
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this machine. Handled all the pork we had to grind (30 lb) for sausage, and worked like a gem in stuffing the casing for smoked sausage. We didn't expect much for what we paid for this little machine, but we got so much more than we expected. Great purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Strong and easy.
customer_reviews.text: Used my first time grinding up 25lbs of venison once through medium and then through fine all within 26 minutes and the motor never slowed down once.
customer_reviews.author: TONY STIER

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and after 1 year is working great
customer_reviews.text: Throw away your standing mixer attachment and buy this. Excellent product and after 1 year is working great. Best burgers ever at my house
customer_reviews.author: davwal

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Really great grinder, don't be afraid to really turn the ring while assembling. I had some issues with some of the parts and customer service had new parts to me in two days and they answered the phone after hours.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Ritter

customer_reviews.title: Family Approved!
customer_reviews.text: While I'm vegan the rest of the family isn't and like making their own ground meat products. They love this grinder's power and say it is generally more quiet than past grinders they used.
customer_reviews.author: Whitewind

customer_reviews.title: Very useful for making Kebbeh
customer_reviews.text: I like it too much, I made Kebbeh with it and it was fast and the mix was perfect. I recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not strong enough motor
customer_reviews.text: The motor was just not quite strong enough for what I needed...
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: We used it to process husband's elk and it worked beautifully and quickly
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with this machine. We used it to process husband's elk and it worked beautifully and quickly! We are very happy with it, especially with that it was so affordable compared to some of the other grinders we looked at.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This grinder worked really well as long as I did my part. Ground 3 deer which were butchered by three different people, the meat that was completely void of silver and fat went through as fast as you could put it in the stuffer. any silver or fat slowed the process. The meat should be refrigerator temp for best results. Would buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: TW

customer_reviews.title: great for pet owners feeding raw!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS! We grind raw chicken, bone and all to feed our dogs. Been using it since may. No problems at all. Very simple to take apart, clean and put back together. Only thing you need to do is cut any bigger pieces down to fit down the hole to the auger and blades. Highly recommend this product for raw feeding pets.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value and quality
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a beast. used to hate the grinding task in meat processing. with this you're done quickly and looking for something else to grind. remarkable value and quality. why pay more, sometimes a lot more.
customer_reviews.author: SlowHand

customer_reviews.title: A good quality, well made piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: Never bogged down once on the lowest setting (highest torque). Which by the way is all you will need to grind. Still working on perfecting the sausage stuffing. A good quality, well made piece of equipment.
customer_reviews.author: David J. Rice

customer_reviews.title: Happy to operate.
customer_reviews.text: This machine is not loud, cut through like butter, easy to clean. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes a rookie look good.
customer_reviews.text: Simple, rugged, well designed. This grinder went through 5 pounds of pork shoulder in about 10 minutes on my first try! That was on the lower speed, the fine disk and I had cut the meat into strips, not cubes! Good fit, finish and the instructions are simple but concise. I recommend this machine highly.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R. Florey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far I have ground up two deer and it is running great
customer_reviews.author: Devin Denton

customer_reviews.title: I returned and bought a Weston and I'm sure glad I did
customer_reviews.text: I returned and bought a Weston and I'm sure glad I did! I do chicken drumsticks for my dogs and it doesn't do bones! If you don't do bones, it is great!
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: WOW this is amazing, really love how fast it will go through the burger
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but this product made it easy and fun
customer_reviews.text: I was a little intimidated by the idea of grinding my own meat, but this product made it easy and fun. Buy chuck roasts at your grocery store and grind your own hamburger and never worry about the safety / quality of your ground beef. Also great to use for making sausage and will also work to stuff casings.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lawyer

customer_reviews.title: This grinder is great. I ground 10 pounds of chicken in less ...
customer_reviews.text: This grinder is great. I ground 10 pounds of chicken in less than 5 minutes. it is powerful and easy to clean by hand. I made bacon burger and, again, it ground it quickly. I love my new toy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the best grinder you can buy
customer_reviews.text: Super grinder. It cut our processing time 10 fold over using the meat grinder on our KitchenAid. Very well build and easy to clean. The course disk was perfect for Italian Sausage. Also comes with other smaller grinding disks should you want them. Very powerful, never bogs down. An excellent machine
customer_reviews.author: Steven Marinkovich

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to stuff sausage
customer_reviews.text: The machine works ok for grinding but if you are planning to use to stuff meat you have grounded for sausage, this is not the machine .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Powerfull meat grinder
customer_reviews.text: Very powerfull meat grinder. I use it often when grinding deer meat or any other meat. It works great and has no problem grinding through lean meats. It came with additional nozzles to make sausages. I tried making sausage and it worked out great. No complaints and it's pretty affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Roman

customer_reviews.title: Great Grinder for me!
customer_reviews.text: I just got done using this grinder today (Feb 2020) and thought I would see when I bought it. I see I bought it 2013. It has worked very well for me. I have used it for 3 elk, about 8 deer and 4-5 javelina. I have had no problems with it at all. My wife and I consider it one of our best purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Shauna Richins

customer_reviews.title: great machine
customer_reviews.text: ez to set up works great cleans up fast, recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Rich a

customer_reviews.title: Great little grinder.
customer_reviews.text: Sure cut down on processing carcass. Great for hunting season. Son was impressed with how quickly it handled the meat. It will be great for making sausage anytime. Easy to clean and assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and frozen tomatoes for sauce like nobody's business
customer_reviews.text: This thing chews up meat for miles, and frozen tomatoes for sauce like nobody's business. Update: June 2019, and this thing is still eating everything I feed it like nobody's business.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Lowell

customer_reviews.title: Machine showed up today and auger would not spin in ...
customer_reviews.text: Machine showed up today and auger would not spin in the machine - would not grind meat. Ordered a replacement unit today and hope this was just a one off lemon. Will update review after new machine shows up.
customer_reviews.author: Noah

customer_reviews.title: Healthy Pet Food Maker
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in order to feed my cats a healthier and natural diet. I have not had any problems with this grinder. It easily handles boned chicken thighs, chicken breasts, and cornish game hens. This grinder has enabled me to transition my pets from commercial processed foods to a healthier home-made diet. I highly recommend this grinder to all pet owners who are concerned about the health of their pets. For Kitten's sake, go and buy one now.
customer_reviews.author: deciderdude

customer_reviews.title: Love this product.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this so I would know what was in my ground meat and for making healthier meals. I was amazed at the difference in taste and quality. It is actually cheaper to buy a good piece of meat (roast, chicken, pork loin, etc.) and grind it than buying ground beef at the store. Clean up is not hard at all. I hand wash instead of using the dishwasher, a bottle brush also comes in handy for cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: It did a great job kinda loud but it did the job pretty ...
customer_reviews.text: Finally used the grinder to grind up 40lbs of beef. It did a great job kinda loud but it did the job pretty smoothly and had no issues it.
customer_reviews.author: Purple Monkeys

customer_reviews.title: Quality is Exellent
customer_reviews.text: How can you go wrong with STX International product. Finely made, easy to operate, and most important not only made in the USA, but from the hartland of the U.S. that know not only about beef and pork, but game also. Thanks to the whole team over there and be safe
customer_reviews.author: Kabar1156

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: works great, preparation tip keep meat very cold, its much easier to process
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia

customer_reviews.title: A Great Value for the Money
customer_reviews.text: Having graduated up from the Oster my grandmother used, I was extremely happy with the Megaforce's performance. I was initially concerned by the relatively light weight of the unit itself, but that was totally unjustified. It tore through three grinds of 30 lbs each in about half an hour total, with no loss of power or overheating and a steady consistency. Clean up was a breeze and it stores well following the manufacturers directions and oiling the parts. I have to say, I actually looking forward to using it again and that's high praise coming from a guy that generally considers these things a necessary evil.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin J. Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: I got this to make raw food for my dogs ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this to make raw food for my dogs, but it wouldn't grind chicken bones and the meat will come out all smashed and will jam. I even tried cooking the chicken bone to make it easier but it still wouldn't grind them. Not dish washer safe. So far been using it to grind carrots.
customer_reviews.author: coeur29

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: the most best Grinding ever, I toke this one for my friend and I purchase other one before 5 years and till now work like new , I believe it will stay forever. thanks for the factory that still provide quality of service
customer_reviews.author: MODERN ART SUPPLIES A PRODUCT OF SMARTVISION CO

customer_reviews.title: I was a little disappointed that there was hesitation when I was trying to ...
customer_reviews.text: I was a little disappointed that there was hesitation when I was trying to grind a chicken breast with bone on. I cut the breast into about six sections with my cleaver, but; the grinder didn't react as readily as I had hoped. All in all, did a great job. My kitten is eating, once more!
customer_reviews.author: Arlyn Greig

customer_reviews.title: Great grinder for the money
customer_reviews.text: Purchased after looking at many grinders to process deer meat works great
customer_reviews.author: stephen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome meat grinder
customer_reviews.text: This machine is incredible Easy Clean easy to work I recommend this product I love it as on a video I watched on Eastman this made me my own processor I process the meat that I like the way I like it
customer_reviews.author: Johanna harden

customer_reviews.title: then developed a problem which is annoying to say the least
customer_reviews.text: The unit worked well for a year or so, then developed a problem which is annoying to say the least. Liquids produced in grinding in the auger region seep back past the "seals" at the back end and bake on to the shaft where the connection to the motor is made. This produces a mess! I called Mercantile Station and they told me not to grind anything with liquid content, only frozen meat! Obviously their seals are not long lasting and they don't replace them. Lesson learned-always make sure that unit can be fixed.
customer_reviews.author: ralph

customer_reviews.title: Works wonderfully!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this meat grinder after quite a bit of research. I have now had it for a few months and I love it! It is wonderful! I use it to grind mostly chicken and turkey and each time I use it I get better and quicker at it! I would highly recommend this product to anyone in a heartbeat! My only strong suggestion would be to read and follow the instruction manual to prevent any user error issues.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer R

customer_reviews.title: Great machine.
customer_reviews.text: I make my own ground beef. This machine doesnt bog down. Grinds with ease. Havent had any problems with it clogging up. Best grinder I've owned so far
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann

customer_reviews.title: Ease of Operation
customer_reviews.text: A reasonably priced grinder that suits my needs. It processes easily & cleans up quickly. It's not too heavy & bulky so storing it is easy too.
customer_reviews.author: M M Hein

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: The meat needs to be perfectly between frozen and thawed to work right.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: more than pleased
customer_reviews.text: Every once in a while you are suprised at the "super deal". I am in heaven with my new grinder. Dog food made with chicken wings and legs go through the grinder with ease. Fatty pork butt roasts used in making my Italian sausage are ground perfectly. (let it be half frozen before grinding). You can't do better than this without paying a big amount for a commercial grinder.
customer_reviews.author: John G.

customer_reviews.title: Can’t beat this grinder for home use!
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty for home use. Went right through about 40 lbs. of beef and pork with ease. Wish it had a larger grind plate. The grind with the largest plate was not as coarse as I would like it, but not a major issue.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Krena

customer_reviews.title: Great home grinder
customer_reviews.text: This is a great grinder for the home. Now that it is so hard to get the grind I want at my local market, my husband just grinds it himself and we know that it is correct.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Grinder met expectations and more. Was very happy with the grinder performance. Used to process venison mixed with pork. Made brats, sausage, and Slim Jim type jerky. Haven't tried the juicer yet
customer_reviews.author: TG

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: I used it to grind up chicken breasts. However as you can see by the picture the grinder nozzle attachments are very cheaply put together and not secure at all. I only ran the machine for three breasts before the grinder nozzle went flying off. It was a great waste of time and money!
customer_reviews.author: R Riley

customer_reviews.title: I've had a few grinders and this one gets it ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had a few grinders and this one gets it done. It grinds fast and doesn't require exceptional pressure to push it through. Sausage stuffs quickly and evenly. I can't really bring myself to spend $300+ on a grinder, and with this one, I don't think I'll ever really need to.
customer_reviews.author: Harlan

customer_reviews.title: You'll like it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this grinder from Amazon about 3 months ago. I grind chicken bones for my 4 large dogs, as well as large amounts of meats (70 to 100 lbs) at one time. It handles the bones without a problem - having them cold or semi-frozen works best. I grind my own hamburger from huge pieces of chuck. No pink slime. I rarely have to push meat into the hopper as the machine seems to inhale it on its own. I also like the two speed feature and the auto circuit breaker, though it has yet to overheat or jam up. I've already recommended it to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Carol and Phil

customer_reviews.title: This grinder probably designed by Boeing.
customer_reviews.text: This grinder is the one you want for heavy use.
customer_reviews.author: J. Craig

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended!!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Strong motor. Easy to clean and overall great investment!
customer_reviews.author: Daleen

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: working great so far, should meet my needs for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Not as strong as I expected from reading reviews
customer_reviews.author: Robertson  N Arbuckle

customer_reviews.title: Well Built - very efficient-
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfect for making deer sausage. Ground up deer meat and pork without any hesitation. Easy to assemble easy to clean, very durable. Price was reasonable for the quality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Nick D

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Grinder and Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Absolute junk will never buy from this company again, terrible products that are soo falsely advertised and terrible customer service, I bought 3 of these absolute pieces of scrap
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: Works well, with minimum loss.
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this meat grinder, having owned it for almost a year now. It makes easy work of meat, with little loss. I make hamburgers, chicken patties, and ground beef and pork regularly with the grinder, and the texture of fresh ground meat is unbeatable. If you're on the fence, I would say, buy it! If you have more time on your hands, you can try sausage making. I've done it once so far, with great results.
customer_reviews.author: Raoul

product_meta.title: The Heavy-Duty STX Megaforce Classic 3000 Series Air Cooled Electric Meat Grinder Sausage Stuffer: 4 Grinding Plates, 3 S/S Blades, Sausage Tubes, Kubbe Maker. 2 Free Meat Claws & 3-in-1 Patty Maker!
feature_bullets: The STX Megaforce Classic 3000 Series with a "Patented Air-Cooled System" is a Heavy-Duty Grinder with a Locked Motor Wattage of 3000 Watts but Normally Uses between 800 Watts & 1200 Watts “Under Load” (While Grinding). This Grinder Grinds between 180 and 240 Lbs of Meat per Hour (When Prepped for Grinding Properly - Stripped or Cubed). This also depends on the Size of Grinding Plate being used, the Type of Meat being Ground and the Consistency of the Meat being ground.

Includes: 1 - Size #12 Polished Aluminum (Food Grade) Grinding Head and 3 Lb High-Capacity Meat Tray, 3 - 304 Grade Stainless Steel Cutting Blades, 3 - Sizes of Grinding Plates, 1 - Beaner (Sausage Stuffing) Plate, 3 - Sizes of Sausage Stuffing Tubes (1/2", 5/8" & 3/4"), 1 - Kubbe/Kibbe Making Attachment & 1 - Meat Pusher/Stuffer. We have also added 2 Free Meat Shredder Claws and a Free 3-in-1 Burger-Slider Press/Maker which you will find Very Useful!

The Meat Auger that comes with this unit Features AVI (Advanced Variable Intake) Technology and when combined with the 2-1/8" Hopper Opening for feeding the meat, provides you with the capability of grinding larger portion sizes of meat. This Grinder has a Size #12 Grinding Head and the Grinding Plates included with this grinder are 2-5/8" in diameter which also allows much more meat to be ground in a much shorter time compared to Size #8 and Size #5 Meat Grinders.

PLEASE READ THIS: DO NOT grind Animal Tendons, Vegetables, Plants, Nuts or Fruits with this grinder. This is a "Heavy Duty" Household Meat Grinder and is Not Intended for Commercial Use. This MEAT Grinder "WILL NOT" GRIND BONES! Although you may see customer comments/reviews indicating otherwise, results are not consistent, and you will most likely be dissatisfied with your purchase of this product.

All STX International Products come with a 30-Day Unconditional Money Back Guaranty which also includes a 3-Year Warranty with the Cost of Parts and Labor Included. PLEASE SCROLL DOWN THIS PAGE FOR MANY MORE PHOTOS & INFORMATION ON THIS PRODUCT!
